title: Subchapter C - Construction Of Facilities
content:
Subchapter C - Construction Of Facilities

State Regulations

Part 77 - Standards For Physical Facilities Of Hospitals For The Mentally Ill, Schools For The Retarded, And Alcohol Facilities (ยง 77.1 to 77.11)

Part 78 - [Repealed]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
